poem:
### Secrets in Whispers

In shadows of the secret room,  
where whispered winds are wrought,  
the keepers of scripted truth  
guard bloodied moonlit thought.  
Yet, like autumn leaves in twirl,  
dancing in errant breeze,  
they scatter sacred trust to nights—  
untamed, with whispered pleas.  
Here, the fragile pulse of silence  
finds its unrelenting ease.
